moves.name: Boo!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Attack by 2 stat ranks. When the user is in Disguised Form, raises the user’s critical-hit rate by 1 stat rank. When the user is in Busted Form, raises the user’s Defense and Sp. Def by 1 stat rank.

moves.name: Phantom Force
moves.effect: The user takes on a phantom presence. After a set time, this presence fades and the user attacks. No other actions can be taken while in phantom presence. Opponents’ moves will not hit the user while it is in this presence. If the user is hit by a sync move while in phantom presence, the presence will fade.

syncMove.name: Trick-or-Treat Shadow Claw
syncMove.description: This move’s power increases when the target is confused.

passives.name: Criticonfuse 9
passives.description: Leaves the target confused when the user’s move is a critical hit.

passives.name: Opportunistic 9
passives.description: Lowers the target’s Defense by one stat rank when the user’s attack move is successful against a confused opponent.

passives.name: Disguise
passives.description: Protects the user from damage from a single attack move. After this passive skill takes effect, its Pokémon shifts from Disguised Form to Busted Form.

grid.bonus: Shadow Claw:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Phantom Force:MP Refresh 2- Has a chance (30%) of restoring one MP of the user’s move when that move is successful.
Shadow Sneak:Critical Strike 2- Powers up the user’s attacks when they become critical hits.
Shadow Sneak:MP Refresh 2- Has a chance (30%) of restoring one MP of the user’s move when that move is successful.
Boo!:MP Refresh 2- Has a chance (30%) of restoring one MP of the user’s move when that move is successful.
Power Flux 5- The fuller the move gauge when moves are selected, the more this powers up moves.
Fast-Track 2- Has a chance (30%) of raising the user’s Speed by one stat rank after its Pokémon uses a move.
Clearheaded- Prevents the user from becoming confused.
Amped Up 1- Raises the user’s Speed by 1 stat rank when it lands a critical hit.
Confusion Synergy 2- Powers up the user’s moves when the target is confused.
Confusion Synergy 3- Powers up the user’s moves when the target is confused.
HP Advantage 3- The larger the user’s percentage of remaining HP, the more it powers up the user’s moves.
Fuzzy Strike 5- Powers up the user’s sync moves when the target is confused.
Boiling Point 2- Raises the user’s Attack by 2 stat ranks the first time it is in a pinch each battle.
Stop Hitting Yourself 5- Raises the chance that an opponent will attack themselves due to being confused.
